notes.title: Ethics approval
notes.p: The study protocol has been approved by the VILAR Ethical Committee on Animal Experimentation and carried out per the “European Convention for the Protection of Vertebrate Animals Used for Experimental and other Scientific Purposes (ETS 123). Strasbourg, 1986”. The VILAR biomedical clinic guarantees strict compliance with regulations established by the “Standard Operation Procedures for the Research” and “Sanitary-epidemiological Rules on the Equipment and Maintenance of the Experimental biological clinics (vivarium).”
